name: Bucked and debarked log, hardwood, green, at veneer mill, E
description: All weights given on an ovendry basis. All moisture contents are on an ovendry basis.  MC% =(weight of water in wood / weight of oven dry wood) *100. Reference to specific gravities use oven dry mass and volumes at specified moisture contents.  Reference to densities use mass and volume at specified moistrue contents.  Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has  undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet  undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.
category: 31-33: Manufacturing/3212: Veneer, Plywood, and Engineered Wood Product Manufacturing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: E= Eastern US United States. The states included MN, IA, MO, WI, IL, NJ, OH, IN, MI, WV, PA, MD, DW, NJ, NY, ME, VT, NH, RI, MA, CT, VA, KY, AR, LA, MS, AL, FL,GA, NC, SC, and TN
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Questionnaires from  4 veneer mills and 5 flooring plants in the E. United States representing 32 states.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: Only mass allocation factors are available for the multi-functional processes (disregard economic allocation factor values-they are mass allocation factors).
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
